isis.stitle: ELECTRICAL SYSTEM TROUBLESHOOTING GUIDE - 5000, 9100, 9200, 9400, AND 9900 MODELS - CUMMINS ISM AND AHD ENGINE SYSTEM - OPERATION - Brake Switch

svcproc.title: Brake Switch
svcproc.para: The brake switch (141) receives a ground signal on circuit 97-GB, through connector (190) on circuit 97-GA from (1091). While the brake pedal is released, the switch is closed supplying a ground on circuit 97AL through connector (190) to ECM connector (1091).
When the brake is applied the ground will be removed signaling the ECM that the brake has been applied.
